flowtrend 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Helper function to run ONE job for CV, in iprob, imu, ifold, irestart.

one_job.Rd

Helper function to run ONE job for CV, in iprob, imu, ifold, irestart.

Usage

one_job(
  iprob,
  imu,
  ifold,
  irestart,
  folds,
  destin,
  lambda_means,
  lambda_probs,
  seedtab = NULL,
  x = NULL,
  ylist,
  countslist,
  l,
  l_prob,
  ...
)

Arguments

iprob

Index for prob.

imu

Index for beta.

ifold

Index for CV folds.

irestart

Index for 1 through nrestart.

folds

CV folds (from make_cv_folds()).

destin

Destination directory.

lambda_means

List of regularization parameters for mean model.

lambda_probs

List of regularization parameters for prob model.

ylist

Data.

countslist

Counts or biomass.

...

Rest of arguments for flowtrend_once().

Value

Nothing is returned. Instead, a file named "1-1-1-1-cvscore.Rdata" is saved in destin. (The indices here are iprob-imu-ifold-irestart).

On this page
